mapper.select: SELECT box.id, room_number, room_size, room_name, room_introduction, box_image.id AS boximage_id, box.url, box_image.name FROM box LEFT JOIN box_image ON box_image.box_id = box.id where 1=1 ORDER BY room_number LIMIT ${(currentPageNo-1)*pageSize},${pageSize}
mapper.update: update box set room_number=#{roomNumber}, room_size=#{roomSize}, room_name=#{roomName}, room_introduction=#{roomIntroduction} where id=#{id};
mapper.insert: insert into box (room_number, room_size, room_name, room_introduction) values(#{roomNumber}, #{roomSize}, #{roomName}, #{roomIntroduction});
